title: Experience Canada's #1 Ski Resort
description: Experience the snow-capped beauty of Whistler, Australia's favourite international ski resort, staying at award-winning Nita Lake Lodge. Voted one of the top five resort hotels in Canada by Travel + Leisure, Whistler's only lakefront property is perfectly located for those looking to make fresh tracks down some of the world's best ski slopes and enjoy outdoor activities like hiking and skating before rugging up next to a cosy wood fire. Your escape includes daily breakfast, CA$150 resort credit and VIP savings on food, drinks and spa treatments.
offer_address: 2131 Lake Placid Rd, Whistler, BC V0N 1B2, Canada

title: Snow Escape to the Best Ski Resort in Canada
description: Experience the 2019 ski season from the best vantage point in Whistler - be just steps away from Blackcomb’s gondola, while remaining in the very heart of Whistler Village. Ski to your heart’s content with eight days/seven nights at Hilton Whistler and enjoy daily buffet breakfasts, a three-course dining experience and much more for two.
offer_address: 4050 Whistler Way, Whistler, BC V0N 1B4, Canada

title: Experience the Number One Ski Resort in Canada
description: Experience the snow-capped beauty of Whistler - Australia's favourite international ski resort - staying at one of its finest resorts, the award-winning Nita Lake Lodge. Voted one of the top five resort hotels in Canada by Travel + Leisure, Whistler's only lakefront property is perfectly located for those looking to make fresh tracks down some of the world's best ski slopes and enjoy outdoor activities like hiking and skating before rugging up next to cosy wood fire. Your escape includes daily breakfast, daily cocktails and VIP savings on food, beverages and spa treatments.
offer_address: 2131 Lake Placid Rd, Whistler, BC V0N 1B2, Canada

title: Hilton Whistler Ski Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Indulge in the snow-capped beauty of Whistler and experience renowned Hilton elegance steps from some of the world's best ski slopes at Hilton Whistler Resort & Spa. Make the most of this winter playground with easy access to the Whistler and Blackcomb Mountains, and be pampered in pure Hilton luxury with sumptuous daily breakfast, one three-course dinner at Cinnamon Bear Grille plus a nightly cocktail, glass of wine or beer per adult, with all resort fees included.

**Travelling with family?** Check out the Family Upgrades for up to two adults and four children (aged 18 years and under).
offer_address: 4050 Whistler Way, Whistler, British Columbia V8E 1H9, Canada

title: Glamorous Hilton Whistler Alpine Escape in the Heart of Canada's Best Ski Village
description:
Slalom into a winter wonderland at Hilton Whistler Resort & Spa - a glamorous resort that promises an avalanche of alpine adventure. Located just north of Vancouver, the town of Whistler is home to the largest ski resort in North America and one of the most sought-after destinations for snow lovers: the world-famous Whistler Blackcomb. Averaging 10.8 metres of snow per year, this iconic Canadian resort is the perfect destination if you are looking for reliable and consistent snow, spectacular slopes fit for experienced skiers and beginners alike, and a myriad of activities amid the snow - including heli-skiing, ice climbing and ice fishing.

Step out of the hotel and straight onto the powder-perfect slopes by hopping on the Whistler Village Gondola, located less than 150 metres from the hotel's doorstep. After a day on the slopes, return for a dip in the heated outdoor pool or a meal at the hotel's Cinnamon Bear Grille, a top-notch eatery known for its aprés-ski vibes.
offer_address: 4050 Whistler Way, Whistler, British Columbia V8E 1H9, Canada

title: Ultimate Snow Escape in The Best Ski Resort in Canada
description: Ski to your heart’s content and experience renowned Hilton elegance steps away from some of the world’s finest slopes, at Hilton Whistler Resort and Spa. Make the very best of this winter playground with easy access to the Whistler and Blackcomb Gondolas, and be pampered in pure Hilton luxury with sumptuous daily buffet breakfast and a nightly cocktail per adult. Travelling with the family? Check out the family packages, perfect for up to eight people with children aged 18 and under staying for free.
offer_address: 4050 Whistler Way, Whistler, BC V8E 1H9, Canada

title: Pan Pacific Whistler Village Centre - PPHG - LPP
offer_address: 4299 Blackcomb Way, Whistler, BC V8E 0X3, Canada

title: Idyllic Whistler Ski Resort Escape with Heated Pool & Valet Ski Storage
description:
Feel the rush of snowy thrills as you step into a winter wonderland at this all-suite stay, nestled in the heart of the Whistler Village. Perched ideally at the base of the Blackcomb and Whistler gondolas, this ski-in ski-out retreat is a winter lover's fantasy as it offers dreamy snow-clad mountain vistas drizzled with fresh powder.

Spend your days skiing on the slopes and for the perfect apres-ski vibes, absorb the legendary village buzz and enjoy easy access to vibrant shops, pubs and restaurants from your hotel. Unwind in style in the well-appointed suites imbued with thoughtful amenities, relax your muscles in the heated saltwater pool and tuck into hearty pub fare with authentic Gaelic cheer at the Dubh Linn Gate Irish Pub. This escape has everything required to curate the perfect adventure-filled mountainside stay.
offer_address: 4320 Sundial Crescent, Whistler, British Columbia V8E 1G6, Canada

title: Enchanting Fairmont Whistler Alpine Luxury with Mountainside Spa & Golf Course
description:
Ski-in to alpine luxury at the iconic Fairmont Chateau, set between the breathtaking peaks of Whistler and Blackcomb Peak. This grand, castle-like resort gives way to warm, lodge-style interiors with roaring fireplaces and an inviting apres-ski atmosphere - a haven for outdoor enthusiasts and lovers of the finer things.

Dining is exceptional with onsite dining venues offering the perfect spot to indulge as the alpenglow settles over the resort. After days hitting the slopes, guests can unwind at Vida Spa or tee off at the stunning mountain-backed golf course.
offer_address: 4599 Chateau Boulevard, Whistler, British Columbia V8E 0Z5, Canada
